objects.description: [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has exfiltrated data collected from victim devices to C2 servers.(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)(Citation: PaloAlto Unit42 ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibileFerret October 2024)
